item.description:
** Free Advanced Screening **


GONZO: THE LIFE AND WORK OF HUNTER S. THOMPSON



WEDNESDAY, JULY 2ND
KENDALL SQUARE THEATER @ 7PM



From Oscar-winning director Alex Gibney (Taxi to the Dark Side, Enron: The Smartest Guys in the Room) and narrated by Johnny Depp, GONZO is a portrait of the late gonzo journalist Hunter S. Thompson.

View the trailer here: http://www.hunterstho...


Please print out the pass located in the group's file for admission, each pass admits two - feel free to print as many as you need.
Just as an FYI: seating is not guaranteed and is available on a first come first served basis, so arrive early!


Email advanced.screening@gmail.com with "GONZO" as the subject line if you have any further questions.



Synopsis: From Oscar-winning director Alex Gibney (Taxi to the Dark Side, Enron: The Smartest Guys in the Room) and producer Graydon Carter (Surfwise, The Kid Stays in the Picture) comes a probing look into the uncanny life of national treasure and gonzo journalism inventor Dr. Hunter S. Thompson. A fast moving, wildly entertaining documentary with an iconic soundtrack, the film addresses the major touchstones in Thompson's life?his intense and ill fated relationship with the Hell's Angels, his near-successful bid for the office of sheriff in Aspen in 1970, the notorious story behind the landmark Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas, his deep involvement in Senator George McGovern's 1972 presidential campaign, and much more. Narrated by Johnny Depp.


Opening in theaters: July 4, 2008
item.why: Narrated by Johnny Depp and nominated for the Grand Jury Prize Sundance
item.name: Free Advance Screening - GONZO: THE LIFE AND WORK OF HUNTER S. THOMPSON
